description: Margaret Batjer, an accomplished violinist who joins us this week to talk about Stradivarius instruments, tells us a joke about how even the best violin doesn’t make a great musician.

contentencoded: Margaret Batjer, an accomplished violinist who joins us this week to talk about Stradivarius instruments, tells us a joke about how even the best violin doesn’t make a great musician.
teaser: Margaret Batjer, an accomplished violinist who joins us this week to talk about Stradivarius instruments, tells us a joke about how even the best violin doesn’t make a great musician.
title: “Shoot the Violinist” – Margaret Batjer
